title: Ability to re-open closed windows and tabs
content: Would it be useful to have an optional feature to allow TB to re-open closed windows and tabs, for example after you accidentally quit the app (as we still have no confirm dialog), or you may just fat-finger-close something... or if the app crashes. Firefox does this mostly well, I wonder if that figure might be implemented here for TB.
creator: forrie1

title: Still trying to get the unified toolbar shortcuts
content:
Been following the steps on this page -- https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new -- but I don't get the toolbar selection.

I don't get the right menu list shown there. See the attachment which shows what I get when I right click on "Unified toolbar."

Am I using a different version 128.2.0esr?
creator: KJS-LES

title: Transferring Thunderbird  profile from old to new Windows 11 PC
content: I tried to transfer the Profile of Thunderbird Version 115 from my Windows 10 PC to a new Windows 11 PC. I followed the steps posted at the website ( https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/moving-thunderbird-data-to-a-new-computer ) I got to Step 5 for the new / destination computer 5. Locate the "Profile Folder" entry, but when I clicked Open Folder. Windows could not find the Thunderbird profile folder How do I bring my Thunderbird profile to the current version of Thunderbird? Thank you
creator: pb4321
